작성할 보고서 설명: Reports to SubmitThis displays reports assigned to me but not submitted.
최근 생선된 보고서 설명: Reports recently submitted This displays up to 20 reports in a reverse chronological order.
보고자 간 공개 설명: Reporters are free to view reports written by other reporters.
보고자 간 비공개 설명: A reporter can only view his/her reports.
보고서주소복사IE:
The URL has been copied. 
Press Ctrl+V to paste at wherever you want.
보고서주소복사ETC: It is a report URL. Press Ctrl+C to copy it to the clipboard.
You have no report to write.
미보고 중입니다: He/She has not submitted a report.
해당 보고서를 삭제 하시겠습니까?: Are you sure you want to delete it?
작성중인 보고서가 있습니다. 불러오시겠습니까?: You have a report draft. Would you like to import it?
You have to connect via PC if you'd like to write a report with a template.
You are not able to add reports because your department has not been set.
Please check the day of the week.
선택한 보고서를 삭제 하시겠습니까?: Are you sure you want to delete the selected report?
선택한 보고서의 상태를 '정상'으로 변경합니다.변경 하시겠습니까?: Would you like to change the status of the selected report to normal?
보고서를 중지 하시겠습니까?: Are you sure you want to suspend the reports?
Please select day of a week.
You are not able to edit a report because that was written via PC.
You cannot import a draft because a template has been changed.
폴더 이관 경고:
The report will be moved to '{{arg1}}'.
Even though the report is moved, sharing settings will remain.
Will you continue?
폴더 수정 변경사항 알림:
Changes of a reporter, a repeat cycle, a template will be applied
when the next series report is created.
보고서 {{arg1}}로 이동: The report will be moved to '{{arg1}}'.</br>Even though the report is moved, sharing settings will remain.</br>Will you continue?
Loading a previous report... Please wait a minute.
폴더 중지 설명:
Even though a report is suspended,
You can see tasks in it from 'Suspended Reports'.
보고서 및 선택한 보고서 내 모든 데이터가 삭제 됩니다. 삭제하시겠습니까: All data in a report and selected report will be deleted. Will you continue?
정기보고안내: When you create a report, no reports will be generated on that day. Reports will be generated by the settings after the day it was created.
내가 보고자로 등록된 정기 보고서 중 아직 작성하지 않은 보고서를 보여드: This displays reports assigned to me but not submitted.
This displays up to 20 reports in a reverse chronological order.
정기 보고서 툴팁: More than 1 month daily, 3 months weekly, 6 months monthly It depends on which type of regular report, a report will be changed stop when there is no register new report.
임시저장 하시겠습니까?: Would you like to save it?
